actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to place Arlington National Cemetery within the National Cemetery System.

summary.text: Transfers jurisdiction over, and responsibility for, Arlington National Cemetary from the Secretary of the Army to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs. Directs the Administrator to permit the burial in National Cemetary of any Veteran and any of his dependents entitled by law to burial in national cemetaries.

titles.title: A bill to place Arlington National Cemetery within the National Cemetery System.
